title: Claim: “lack of long-term revenue certainty” is Crashing Aussie Renewable Investment.
description: Are renewables investors worried the subsidies could cease?

Are renewables investors worried the subsidies could cease?
Australia could miss clean energy target as solar and wind investment slumps, investors warn
